name: SolaxPower
0:
”Alexa open smart energy”
”Alexa ask smart energy how much power yield today”
”Alexa ask smart energy to tell me the amount of feed-in power this month”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart energy
des:
This skill works with Solar inverter and energy storage system to inquire energy and device status, e.g.
how much power yield today/this month/this year/totally?
how much power feed-in grid today/this month/this year/totally?
how much power consumed totally?
what is the solar revenue?
how much battery power left?
what is the inverter status?
Ask my charger set to green mode.
Ask my charger current status.
Ask my charger current mode.
Ask my charger the charging power this time.
Ask my charger about the amount of electricity charged this time.
